title: Only in Rutherglen
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Rural conditions
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Victoria - Rural conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Country life - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Country life - Psychological aspects
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Women in business
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Success in business
abstract: The businesses that make Rutherglen such a great town. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from Indigo'.
description: From classic cars to Parker Pies, from crafty ladies to clocks and watches, with a cooper from the Keg Factory thrown in for good measure. Only in Rutherglen would you find such businesses side by side in the main street.
